original_text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
korean_text: 부녀여, 내가 이제 네게 구하노니 서로 사랑하자 이는 새 계명 같이 네게 쓰는 것이 아니요 처음부터 우리가 가진 것이라

sentences.original_text: And now I beseech thee, lady,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 내가 부디 청하노니, 여인이여,

sentences.original_text: not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 내가 당신에게 새 계명을 쓰는 것 같지 않고,

sentences.original_text: but that which we had from the beginning,
